# hw_stroopwafel (Resource)

Mock stroopwafel resource for instructional purposes



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `kind` (String) The kind of stroopwafel (e.g., classic, caramel, chocolate, honey)

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the stroopwafel resource

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Stroopwafel identifier
- `price` (Number) The price of the stroopwafel in dollars (hardcoded to $1.75)
